## Carga de datos

```{r}
load("datos/accidentes2020_data.rda")
library(tidyverse)
accidentes2020_data
accidentes <- accidentes2020_data |> 
  as_tibble()
  
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Resumen

```{r}
resumen <- accidentes|> 
  filter(sexo %in% c("Desconocido"))|> 
  count(sexo)
resumen
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Visualizaci√≥n

```{r}
ggplot(resumen) +
  geom_col(aes(x = sexo, y = n, fill = sexo), alpha = 0.6) +
  ggthemes::scale_fill_colorblind() +
  theme_minimal()
```
